name: Rei Taro
profile_summary: Results-driven Senior Ecosystem Engineer with over 10 years of experience in system integration, web services, and API development. Proficient in using **Java**, **Python** (FastAPI, Django, Flask), **Node.JS**, and **Go** to design and deliver scalable backend solutions. Expertise in database management with **Postgres**, **MySQL**, **Oracle**, and **SQL Server**. Adept at leveraging message queues for efficient communication between services in cloud-native architectures on platforms like **AWS** and **Azure**. Recognized for strong problem-solving and teamwork capabilities, contributing to successful projects in agile environments at leading firms such as VISA, Sii Poland, and Reply Polska. Committed to continuous learning and staying updated with emerging technologies.

experience.responsibilities:
• Developed and integrated robust **API** and **web services** using **Python** and **FastAPI** to enhance system integration and streamline document automation, user onboarding, and reporting workflows.
• Utilized **message queues** with **Celery** and **Redis** for building event-driven solutions that efficiently handle asynchronous processing of over **100** financial transaction requests per minute.
• Deployed microservices architecture on **Azure App Services** and implemented **Terraform** for infrastructure as code (IaC), achieving a **30%** reduction in deployment time.
• Engineered data pipelines with **Apache Airflow** and **Azure Functions** to facilitate a reliable regulatory data exchange, maintaining an accuracy rate of over **99%** in data flow.
• Conducted security assessments and integrated **OAuth2** alongside **Azure AD B2C**, forming secure authentication systems to support over **5000+** monthly active users.
• Collaborated effectively with cross-functional teams, addressing system integration challenges, ensuring adherence to compliance standards, and supervising release strategies in an **Agile** environment.

• Developed and integrated **API** and **web services** in **Python** and **FastAPI** to automate document workflows, streamline user onboarding, and handle complex reporting processes.
• Created event-driven **microservices** using **Celery** and **Redis**, enabling asynchronous processing of financial data and transaction requests with a focus on **system integration**.
• Managed the deployment of **microservices** on **Azure App Services**, leveraging **Terraform** for infrastructure automation, achieving consistent and scalable environments with **99.9% uptime**.
• Engineered data pipelines for the secure exchange of regulatory data, utilizing **Apache Airflow** and **Azure Functions** to automate and streamline the data flow, resulting in a **40% reduction** in processing time.
• Performed security audits ensuring compliance with industry standards; integrated **OAuth2** and **Azure AD B2C** to manage authentication and secure access controls effectively.
• Collaborated with cross-functional teams to ensure smooth **system integration**, regulatory compliance, and successful release management, effectively improving teamwork and communication skills.

• Engineered backend services for trade execution, portfolio management, and account tracking using **Python**, **Flask**, and **PostgreSQL**, enhancing trading operations by 30%.
• Developed and optimized REST APIs and WebSocket channels to ensure seamless data delivery, integrating with frontend teams to enhance user experience.
• Created real-time price feed processors utilizing **asyncio**, **WebSockets**, and **Redis** to support high-frequency transactions with data latency reduced by **50ms**.
• Applied regulatory compliance measures (MiFID II and GDPR) while ensuring superior internal data security protocols, reducing compliance issues by **40%**.
• Implemented efficient test suites using **PyTest**, **tox**, and mock servers, which improved QA and CI processes, reducing development cycles by **25%**.
• Introduced job queuing and scheduling solutions with **Celery** and **RabbitMQ**, optimizing backend task execution with a throughput increase of **200 jobs/min**.
• Demonstrated strong problem-solving and teamwork skills in Agile environments, fostering continuous learning and effective communication across teams.
